thread.title: EXCLUSIVE! We've got a gem of an idea! - Rakesh Roshan on Krrish 4
thread.title_full: EXCLUSIVE! We've got a gem of an idea! - Rakesh Roshan on Krrish 4

author: Karishma Shetty
title: EXCLUSIVE! We've got a gem of an idea! - Rakesh Roshan on Krrish 4
text: January 30, 2017 Karishma Shetty 5899 reads 4 comments Hrithik Roshan's Kaabil released last Wednesday and has been doing exceptionally well at the box-office despite going through many trials and tribulations. One can't help but wonder what is next for the Roshans. Could Krrish 4 be their next big project? In an interview with us, we asked Rakesh Roshan on if he could indulge in any recent developments of the superhero franchise and he said, "We've got a gem of an idea in my mind and we're working on it. Once Kaabil is over when my mind is traffic free, then I will start thinking about Krrish 4 and we will definitely go ahead." Are you excited to see HR donning his cape and saving the world again?
